channels.name: Saudi Quran TV
channels.description: Saudi Quran TV is a renowned Islamic television channel broadcast from the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, dedicated to the continuous recitation of the Holy Qur’an. The channel features beautiful and authentic Qur’anic recitations by esteemed Qaris and the Imams of the Haramain Sharifain (Masjid al-Haram and Masjid an-Nabawi). This channel serves as a source of spiritual peace, reflection, and guidance for Muslims around the world. Through its high-quality and soul-touching Tilawat, Saudi Quran TV helps strengthen faith, encourage regular Qur’an recitation, and create a serene Islamic atmosphere in homes and hearts.

channels.name: Saudi Sunnah TV
channels.description: Sunnah TV is an Islamic television channel broadcast from the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, dedicated to promoting the teachings of the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ through authentic Sunnah-based content. The channel primarily features live coverage and recorded programs from Masjid an-Nabawi, including sermons, lectures, and guidance rooted in the Qur’an and Sahih Hadith. Sunnah TV plays an important role in educating Muslims about Islamic manners, worship, and daily life according to the Sunnah. Through scholarly talks and spiritually enriching broadcasts, the channel helps viewers strengthen their faith, deepen their understanding of Islam, and follow the path of the Prophet ﷺ with clarity and devotion.

channels.name: Duronto TV
channels.description: Duronto TV is a popular Bangladeshi children’s television channel dedicated to providing fun, educational, and family-friendly entertainment. The channel broadcasts a wide range of animated series, cartoons, and kids’ programs that are designed to inspire creativity, imagination, and positive values among young viewers. With a focus on safe and age-appropriate content, Duronto TV blends entertainment with learning, helping children develop cognitive skills, moral understanding, and curiosity in an engaging way. It has become a trusted choice for parents and a favorite destination for kids seeking joyful and meaningful television experiences.

channels.name: Lotus Macau
channels.description: Lotus Macau is a well-known television channel based in Macau, China, offering a diverse mix of entertainment, lifestyle, and cultural programming. The channel features a variety of content including movies, drama series, music programs, talk shows, and special broadcasts that reflect both regional and international influences. Lotus Macau is recognized for delivering quality entertainment to a wide audience, combining modern media presentation with cultural richness. Through its engaging programs, the channel provides viewers with enjoyable, informative, and culturally diverse television experiences, making it a popular choice among audiences seeking international content.

channels.name: Somoy TV HD
channels.description: Somoy TV is a leading Bangladeshi news television channel that provides up-to-date coverage of national and international events. The channel broadcasts live news, talk shows, investigative reports, and in-depth analyses to keep viewers informed about politics, economics, society, and current affairs. Renowned for its fast, reliable, and accurate reporting, Somoy TV serves as a trusted source of information for the Bangladeshi audience. Through its comprehensive programming, the channel aims to educate, inform, and engage viewers while maintaining journalistic integrity and delivering news in a clear and professional manner.

channels.name: Jamuna TV HD
channels.description: Jamuna TV is a prominent Bangladeshi news and entertainment television channel that delivers comprehensive coverage of national and international events. The channel features live news broadcasts, talk shows, documentaries, entertainment programs, and special reports, catering to a diverse audience with a mix of information and entertainment. Known for its timely and reliable reporting, Jamuna TV provides viewers with insightful analysis, investigative journalism, and a platform to stay informed about politics, economy, society, and culture. The channel’s commitment to journalistic integrity and quality programming makes it a trusted source of news and entertainment in Bangladesh.

channels.name: BTV National
channels.description: Bangladesh Television (BTV) is the state-owned national television channel of Bangladesh, providing a wide range of programming that includes news, cultural shows, documentaries, entertainment, educational content, and live events. As the country’s first television broadcaster, BTV has played a significant role in shaping Bangladesh’s media landscape and promoting national culture and heritage. BTV delivers reliable news coverage, insightful talk shows, and diverse programs that cater to all age groups and interests. With a focus on education, culture, and public service broadcasting, BTV remains a trusted source of information and entertainment for audiences across Bangladesh and the global Bangladeshi community.

channels.name: Zee Bangla
channels.description: Zee Bangla is a popular Indian Bengali-language television channel that offers a wide variety of entertainment programs, including drama series, reality shows, talk shows, movies, and cultural content. The channel is known for delivering high-quality productions that resonate with Bengali-speaking audiences both in India and abroad. Zee Bangla provides a perfect blend of entertainment, storytelling, and cultural representation, making it a favorite choice for families and individuals seeking engaging and diverse programming. With its innovative shows and viewer-centric approach, the channel continues to be a leading destination for Bengali entertainment.

channels.name: Aakash Aath
channels.description: Aakash Aath is a leading Bengali-language television channel from India, offering a wide range of entertainment programs including drama series, reality shows, movies, music programs, and cultural content. The channel is dedicated to delivering high-quality Bengali entertainment that appeals to viewers of all ages. With its diverse programming, Aakash Aath combines storytelling, cultural representation, and family-friendly content to engage and entertain its audience. The channel has established itself as a popular destination for Bengali viewers seeking both entertainment and cultural connection through television.

channels.name: Fubo Sports
channels.description: Fubo Sports is a premier sports television channel and streaming platform that delivers comprehensive coverage of live sporting events, including football, basketball, baseball, soccer, and other popular sports from around the world. The channel is designed for sports enthusiasts who want real-time updates, expert analysis, and high-quality broadcasts. Fubo Sports provides viewers with an immersive sports experience through live games, highlights, interviews, and in-depth commentary. Its focus on delivering reliable, fast, and engaging sports content makes it a trusted destination for fans looking to stay connected to their favorite teams and leagues globally.

channels.name: BBC Earth HD
channels.description: BBC Earth is a globally renowned television channel dedicated to bringing the wonders of the natural world to viewers through high-quality documentaries and nature programs. The channel showcases breathtaking wildlife, stunning landscapes, and in-depth explorations of the planet’s ecosystems, delivered with the BBC’s signature storytelling and cinematic excellence. BBC Earth inspires curiosity and appreciation for the natural world by combining educational content with visually captivating programs. From wildlife adventures to environmental insights, the channel provides audiences with an immersive experience that educates, entertains, and encourages a deeper understanding of our planet and its incredible biodiversity.

channels.name: AMC Anime
channels.description: AMC Anime is a dedicated television channel and streaming platform that brings a wide range of Japanese anime series and films to viewers around the world. The channel features popular shonen, shojo, action, fantasy, and adventure anime, catering to fans of all ages and tastes. AMC Anime provides high-quality broadcasts, engaging storytelling, and a diverse selection of anime content, making it a favorite destination for enthusiasts of Japanese animation. With a focus on entertainment and cultural appreciation, the channel offers an immersive experience that allows viewers to enjoy beloved anime classics as well as the latest releases.

channels.name: Hum TV
channels.description: Hum TV is a leading Pakistani entertainment television channel known for its high-quality drama serials, reality shows, talk shows, and cultural programs. The channel has earned a reputation for delivering engaging storytelling, relatable characters, and socially relevant content that resonates with audiences both in Pakistan and internationally. Hum TV combines entertainment with meaningful narratives, showcasing the richness of Pakistani culture, traditions, and contemporary life. Its diverse programming, including award-winning dramas and popular shows, makes it a preferred destination for viewers seeking quality entertainment, emotional engagement, and cultural connection.

channels.name: Channel I HD
channels.description: Channel i is a prominent Bangladeshi television channel offering a diverse range of programs, including news, entertainment, drama series, music shows, talk shows, and cultural content. Since its inception, Channel i has been committed to delivering quality programming that informs, entertains, and engages viewers across Bangladesh and beyond. The channel is well-known for its innovative dramas, live events, and cultural programs that showcase Bangladesh’s rich heritage and contemporary creativity. By combining entertainment with informative content, Channel i continues to be a trusted and popular destination for audiences seeking both enjoyment and insight through television.

channels.name: DD Sports
channels.description: DD Sports is India’s national sports television channel, dedicated to providing comprehensive coverage of a wide range of sporting events, including cricket, football, hockey, athletics, and other popular sports. The channel broadcasts live matches, highlights, expert analysis, and special programs to keep sports enthusiasts informed and entertained. As a state-owned channel, DD Sports aims to promote sports culture in India by showcasing both domestic and international competitions. With its focus on delivering timely updates, in-depth commentary, and engaging coverage, DD Sports has become a trusted destination for viewers seeking reliable and immersive sports content.

channels.name: T Sports
channels.description: T Sports is Bangladesh’s first dedicated sports television channel, offering comprehensive coverage of national and international sporting events. The channel broadcasts live matches, highlights, expert analysis, and special sports programs, catering to fans of cricket, football, and a variety of other popular sports. T Sports aims to promote sports culture in Bangladesh by providing high-quality, engaging, and informative coverage. With a focus on real-time updates and in-depth commentary, the channel has become a trusted destination for sports enthusiasts seeking to stay connected with their favorite teams, leagues, and sporting events.

channels.name: ARY Digital
channels.description: ARY Digital is a leading Pakistani entertainment television channel that offers a wide range of programs including drama serials, reality shows, talk shows, morning shows, and cultural content. The channel is renowned for its high-quality productions, engaging storytelling, and programs that resonate with audiences both in Pakistan and internationally. ARY Digital combines entertainment with meaningful narratives, showcasing Pakistani culture, traditions, and contemporary life. Its diverse programming, including award-winning dramas and popular shows, makes it a favorite destination for viewers seeking entertainment, emotional connection, and cultural insight through television.

channels.name: Gubbare TV
channels.description: Gubbare TV is an Indian children’s television channel dedicated to providing fun, educational, and entertaining content for young viewers. The channel features a wide range of animated series, cartoons, and kid-friendly programs designed to inspire creativity, imagination, and positive values. With its focus on safe and age-appropriate content, Gubbare TV combines learning with entertainment, helping children develop cognitive skills, moral understanding, and curiosity in an engaging way. The channel has become a popular choice for parents and children seeking joyful, educational, and family-friendly television experiences.

channels.name: &flix HD
channels.description: &flix is an Indian entertainment television channel that primarily broadcasts Hollywood movies, international films, and popular global series. The channel caters to audiences who enjoy premium cinematic content, offering a diverse range of genres including action, drama, thriller, romance, and adventure. &flix delivers high-quality broadcasts with engaging storytelling, bringing blockbuster films and international hits directly to viewers’ screens. With its focus on global entertainment and cinematic excellence, the channel has become a favorite destination for movie enthusiasts looking for world-class film content in India.

channels.name: Action Hollywood Movies
channels.description: Action Hollywood Movies is a dedicated television channel that showcases the best action-packed Hollywood films, catering to fans of thrilling adventures, high-octane stunts, and captivating storylines. The channel features a wide variety of genres including action, adventure, superhero, and crime thrillers from Hollywood’s biggest studios. With high-quality broadcasts and a focus on adrenaline-pumping entertainment, Action Hollywood Movies provides viewers with non-stop excitement and cinematic experiences. It is the perfect destination for audiences seeking blockbuster action films, iconic heroes, and edge-of-the-seat storytelling from the world of Hollywood.

channels.name: Channel 24
channels.description: Channel 24 is a leading Bangladeshi news television channel that provides 24-hour coverage of national and international news. The channel broadcasts live news updates, breaking news, talk shows, investigative reports, and in-depth analysis on politics, economy, society, and current affairs. Known for its fast, accurate, and responsible journalism, Channel 24 serves as a reliable source of information for viewers in Bangladesh and around the world. Through its comprehensive programming and professional reporting, the channel aims to keep audiences informed, aware, and connected to current events.

channels.name: Independent TV
channels.description: Independent TV is a prominent Bangladeshi news television channel that delivers 24-hour coverage of national and international news. The channel features live news bulletins, breaking news updates, talk shows, investigative journalism, and in-depth analysis on politics, economy, society, and current affairs. Renowned for its professional reporting and modern presentation, Independent TV focuses on accuracy, neutrality, and responsible journalism. Through its wide-ranging programs, the channel keeps viewers informed, engaged, and connected to important events in Bangladesh and around the world.

channels.name: ATN News
channels.description: ATN News is one of Bangladesh’s leading 24-hour news television channels, providing comprehensive coverage of national and international events. The channel broadcasts live news bulletins, breaking news, talk shows, current affairs programs, and special reports focusing on politics, economy, society, and global issues. ATN News is known for its timely updates, responsible journalism, and in-depth reporting. Through its informative and analytical programming, the channel aims to keep viewers well-informed, aware, and connected to the latest developments in Bangladesh and around the world.

channels.name: Ekattor TV HD
channels.description: Ekattor TV is a prominent Bangladeshi news television channel that provides 24-hour coverage of national and international news. The channel broadcasts live news bulletins, breaking news updates, talk shows, investigative reports, and in-depth analysis on politics, economy, society, and current affairs. Known for its strong focus on factual reporting and modern news presentation, Ekattor TV aims to keep viewers informed with accurate, timely, and responsible journalism. Through its diverse programs, the channel plays an important role in shaping public awareness and discussion in Bangladesh.

channels.name: Geo Super
channels.description: Geo Super is Pakistan’s first dedicated sports television channel, offering extensive coverage of national and international sporting events. The channel broadcasts live matches, highlights, expert analysis, sports talk shows, and exclusive interviews, catering to fans of cricket, football, wrestling, and other popular sports. Geo Super is known for its energetic presentation and comprehensive sports programming, keeping viewers updated with real-time action and in-depth commentary. With a strong focus on sports entertainment and analysis, the channel has become a trusted destination for sports enthusiasts in Pakistan and beyond.

channels.name: Willow HD
channels.description: Willow HD is a premier sports television channel dedicated primarily to live cricket coverage, serving cricket fans around the world. The channel broadcasts international cricket matches, domestic leagues, highlights, and expert analysis, delivering high-definition viewing experiences for major tournaments and series. Willow HD is especially popular among South Asian and global cricket audiences for its reliable coverage, in-depth commentary, and exclusive cricket content. With its focus on live action and quality broadcasting, the channel is a top destination for viewers who want to stay connected to the world of cricket.

channels.name: Sony Sports 2
channels.description: Sony Sports Ten 2 is a popular sports television channel that delivers live coverage of major national and international sporting events. The channel primarily features cricket, football, and other high-profile sports, along with match highlights, expert analysis, and special sports programming. Known for its high-quality production and professional commentary, Sony Sports Ten 2 provides an engaging and immersive viewing experience for sports fans. The channel caters to a wide audience by offering comprehensive sports coverage and in-depth insights into games, tournaments, and athletes around the world.

channels.name: Discovery HD
channels.description: Discovery HD is a globally recognized television channel that delivers high-definition factual and documentary programming. The channel features a wide range of content including science, technology, nature, engineering, adventure, and real-life exploration shows, presented with stunning visuals and informative storytelling. Discovery HD is known for its immersive documentaries and educational entertainment that inspire curiosity and learning. By combining cutting-edge production quality with compelling real-world stories, the channel offers viewers an engaging experience that explores the wonders of the world, innovation, and human achievement.
